roles.title: Finance & Accounting Intern
requirements: Commerce, Finance, or Accounting students (or recent grads)
Proficiency with Excel or Google Sheets
Must Have understandings of accounts and statements
Curious, detail-oriented, and ready to learn
responsibilities: Work on Performa accounting and financial statements (P&L, balance sheet, cash flow)
Assist with budgeting, expense tracking, and invoice checks
Coordinate with CA firm on audits and compliance
Help in creating Investment Documents (Pitch Deck)
